mapper.delete: DELETE FROM solaruser.user_export_datum_conf WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql: udexc.id AS user_export_datum_conf_id, udexc.created AS user_export_datum_conf_created, udexc.user_id AS user_export_datum_conf_user_id, udexc.cname AS user_export_datum_conf_cname, udexc.delay_mins / 60 AS user_export_datum_conf_delay_hours, udexc.schedule AS user_export_datum_conf_schedule, udexc.min_export_date AS user_export_datum_conf_min_export_date

SELECT , l.time_zone AS user_export_datum_conf_time_zone, , ,
FROM solaruser.user_export_datum_conf udexc LEFT OUTER JOIN solaruser.user_export_data_conf udac ON udac.id = udexc.data_conf_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solaruser.user_export_dest_conf udec ON udec.id = udexc.dest_conf_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solaruser.user_export_outp_conf uopc ON uopc.id = udexc.outp_conf_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solaruser.user_user u ON u.id = udexc.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solarnet.sn_loc l ON l.id = u.loc_id
mapper.select: WHERE udexc.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY lower(udexc.cname), udexc.id
